main event: An observer sighted 2 or 3 unidentified flying objects that appeared to hover and move with no set pattern for about 5 hours in Petersburg, Michigan.
interesting points: The objects were described as having a soft yellow glow and were distinct from the moon and stars., The observer mentioned having seen these objects previously., There was no physical evidence left behind by the objects., The observer was confused by the erratic movements of the objects., Witnesses were present but their details were not fully available.
sighted object: two or three glowing objects in the sky
witness description: Observer and possibly family members who were present.
